ARABIC: فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: so all that they earned was of no use to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And all that they had done (for security) availed them nothing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and whatever they had been earning proved of no avail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Out of what they had gained, nothing proved to be of any benefit to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore their earnings did not in the least benefit them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And all that they used to earn availed them not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And what they earned did not avail them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: that they earned did not avail them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And that which they were wont to count as gain availed them not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: All that they had acquired was of no avail to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then availed them not that which they had been earning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and what they used to earn did not avail them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And of no avail to them was all that they did (with such art and care)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And all that which they used to earn availed them not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and that which they had earned did not help them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: All they had acquired was of no avail to them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So nothing availed them [from] what they used to earn.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:84] And so that which they used to count as gain, in the way of building fortresses and amassing riches, did not avail, [did not] protect, them, from the chastisement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And that which they were wont to count as gain) their words, deeds and that which they worshipped (availed them not) against Allah's torment.
